Assets have a location within the context of their parent space or in the case of freeform assets have a GPS location. Assets can also be hierarchical and one asset can contain multiple assets. A meeting room could be an asset with chairs, tables etc as child assets.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.delete.definition.confirmation":"Metadata Definition is shared by multiple Types.  Are you sure to delete it?","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.delete.record.confirmation":"Are you sure to delete the {0} named '{1}'?","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.delete.type.confirmatiion":"Are you sure to delete type {0}?","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.devices.intro":"A device represents some physical device that is associated with an asset. A meeting room could have an AC unit as a device. Devices also contain sensors as some devices may contain multiple sensors. Devices and Sensors generate events.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.hierarchy.intro":"Spatial hierarchy view of your Spaces, Assets and Devices.\\nTypes are required before defining the various instance of Spaces, etc as each must be associated with a Type.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.metadatatypes.intro":"Metadata Type allows you to define additional properties for a specific Entity Type that you define. For instance you may define a ‘floor’ Space Type and define a ‘Floor Number’ meta data property. Whenever you create a Space of Type ‘floor’ you will have the ability to define the floor number.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.remove.definition.confirmation":"There maybe instances of {0} with specified values of {1}.  Are you sure to remove this Metadata Definition from {0}?","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.sensors.intro":"Devices also have to have sensors, some devices will have multiple sensors. It is becoming more common for a single device to have multiple sensors integrated into it such as a soil device/sensor could have a pH Sensor, a moisture sensor and a light sensor for example. Each sensor will have a fixed reading type and only ever be associated with a single device.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.spaces.intro":"A space represents a physical space, the space could be a country, region, building, a floor or area within a floor such as a bathroom. Spaces are hierarchical in nature and therefore a region could contain multiple buildings and each building could contain multiple floors etc.\\nSpaces also have an associated View.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.types.intro":"The Model is made up of four main entities: Spaces, Assets and Devices and Sensors.\\nThere are two other supporting entities: Views and Metadata types.\\nEach of the entities have a fixed set of properties. To provide flexibility in terms of defining and adding additional meta data to each of the entities, each entity has a metadata ‘type’. This allows you to define additional properties that will be associated with a specific entity type of Space, Asset etc.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.use.google.map.drawing":"User Google map drawing tool to define a polygon on map","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__text.views.intro":"Views represent a graphical view of a space, they have an image associated with the spaces and also dimensions. The dimensions are used when a Space is a sub space of a larger space and the dimension represent a polygon within the parent space. It also helps define the coordinate space for a given Space.","@com.vantiq.component.ui.ConvertCoordinates__title.change.image":"Choose
